titles.title: Reducing Education Loan Repayment Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitations on the deduction for interest on education loans and to make the deduction, as amended, permanent.
Reducing Education Loan Repayment Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Reducing Education Loan Repayment Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to repeal limitations on the deduction for interest on education loans and to make the deduction permanent.
